item.title: The Altec Lansing Freedom True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds come with noise isolation and GPS tracking
item.description: Source: Altec Lansing. The Freedom True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds have rechargeable lithium ion batteries. Altec Lansing’s new Freedom True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds offer a truly wireless experience, featuring rechargeable lithium-ion batteries integrated into the earbud housings. These innovative earbuds boast a six-hour battery life, IPX7-rated waterproof construction for sweat resistance, and Bluetooth-based GPS tracking to easily locate misplaced earbuds. Expected to launch in the second quarter of 2016 with a manufacturer’s suggested retail price of US$149.

item.title: Introducing the new BioSport In-Ear headphones, now in stock
item.description: Source: Intel. The BioSport In-Ear headphones are now available, developed through a partnership between SMS Audio and Intel. These headphones provide high-quality audio while simultaneously tracking fitness progress. The headphones monitor heart rate through integrated biometric sensors, allowing users to monitor their fitness journey and strive for peak performance. BioSport headphones take in-ear technology to the next level. Their ear-wing design fits securely in the ear canal for constant heart rate monitoring in real time.

item.title: JVC introduces new sports in-ear headphones that are waterproof and washable
item.description: Source: JVC. JVC introduces four new sports headphone options designed to stay securely in place during physical activity, with some models offering waterproof and washable features. The lineup includes two models in both the JVC Gumy Sport and Extreme Fitness series. The Gumy Sport headphones, HA-EN10 and HA-ENR15, utilize a Nozzle Fit earpiece constructed from soft silicone. This unique shape ensures a secure and comfortable fit, preventing the headphones from falling out during workouts.

item.title: The Beats Decade Collection features the Defiant Black-Red colorway for Beats by Dr. Dre
item.description: Source: Beats. The Beats Decade Collection. To commemorate its 10th anniversary, Beats by Dr Dre has unveiled the Beats Decade Collection, a special edition line of products in a striking black and red colorway. This bold design choice pays homage to the brand’s origins and the intense emotions evoked by music. The Defiant Black-Red color scheme is showcased in these models: Source: Beats. The Beats Studio3 wireless headphones, in folded mode.
